Detailed Description

template<typename T, size_t I>
struct hope::detail::indexed_value< T, I >

Structure used to create non recursive tuple via inheritance.
Template Parameters:
T Corresponding type, value of this type is stored as single field
I Index of current field (transparent). Is used to unambiguously determine value
